Series I: Writings, Articles and Notes

Writings, Clippings, Notes: "The Communist Party is Indestructible"/ "On the Decision"/ "The Triumphs of Lenin's Teachings"/ "Truman's national Emergency and Our Immediate Tasks"/ "The Party's Main Line Meets Needs of the People"/ Speech to be Delivered at Mass Meeting on Apr. 26, 1953/ "Economic Trends in the U.S."/ "What Is the Working Class and Progressive Answer to the Growing Fear of an Eisenhower Victory?"/ "Armaments and War Stimulated Inflation are Driving Developing Economic Crisis to Catastrophic Crash". Notes: "Articles and Pamphlets"/ Course Outline on Capitalism
